response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $2,000,000.

This investment could potentially lead to substantial returns, depending on how you integrate it into your operations or utilize its capabilities. My goal is to find the right person who will appreciate its true worth and make the most of its features. I trust that you will consider this offer thoughtfully.

Should you have any questions about the product or would like to discuss its potential impact on your business, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide further details and insights.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
